title: BRITISH TYPE FOUNDRIES ANYONE?
content:
STEPHENSON AND BLAKE  
FIGGINS  
CASLON  
STEVEN SHANKS

can you suggest any other foundries?

thank you in advance,  
fenton
author: fentonfenton

comments.content:
John Haddon & Co.  
C. W. Shortt & Co. Ltd.  
R. H. Stevens & Co.  
Miller & Richard  
Ludlow  
Frederic Wesselhoeft, Ltd.  
Blackfriars Type Foundry, Ltd.  
P. M. Shanks & Sons, Ltd. (presumably Steven is one of the sons, or an heir or assign of same)  
Soldans Ltd.  
Pavyers & Bullens, Ltd.

(Gleaned from _Printing Types of the World_ by Alfred Bastien and G. J. Freshwater (London: Sir Isaac Pitman & Sons, Ltd., 1931). Offers to purchase same will be entertained.
